Rulings.Base: 1. The effect that Special Summons this monster is a Trigger Effect.\n2. If you Synchro Summon "Stardust Dragon" while you have "Synchro Magnet" in your hand and "Stardust Xiaolong" in your GY, you can Special Summon both of them.\n3. If you have multiple copies of "Synchro Magnet" in your hand when you Synchro Summon a Synchro Monster, you can only Special Summon 1 of them.
